helper - just calculates radius from area Just the square root of (area/pi)

Source: R/block_radius_miles_from_area_sq_mi.R
radius_miles_from_area_sqmi.Rd

helper - just calculates radius from area Just the square root of (area/pi)

Usage

radius_miles_from_area_sqmi(area_sqmi)

Arguments

area_sqmi

vector of areas of blocks in square miles.

If area is available only in square meters, it can be converted like this:

area_sqmeters <- 100000

area_sqmi <- census2020download:::area_sqmi_from_area_sqmeters(area_sqmeters)

radius <- radius_miles_from_area_sqmi(area_sqmi)

Value

vector of numbers same shape as input

See also

add_block_radius_miles_to_dt() add_block_radius_miles_to_dt()
